title: DUE 3 - what font is this?
content:
Hi

[http://due3.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140405110946/http:/due3.com/ "http://due3.com/")

What font is used on this website?

He also have some screensavers that use this font: [http://www.due3.com/share/screensaver/index.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20140405110946/http:/www.due3.com/share/screensaver/index.html "http://www.due3.com/share/screensaver/index.html")

Thanks! ; D
author: sinols

comments.content:
Whoot? Due3 himself?  
That was funny! :) Where can i download/by the same style as you use?

I think I found the link on Behance.

[http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/betatype/pill-gothic/buy.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20140405110946/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/betatype/pill-gothic/buy.html "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/betatype/pill-gothic/buy.html")

WOW  
Alots of them,I wanna have the same style that Due3 uses in his website / screensavers \<3 If you just can punch out the same it will be nice :)

Which one?

The _previous version_ looks like 600 mg Medium.

This version! ;)  
The one he is using now :)
